titles.title: A resolution establishing a Women's Bill of Rights to reaffirm legal protections afforded to women under Federal law.
A resolution establishing a Women's Bill of Rights to reaffirm legal protections afforded to women under Federal law.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense of the Senate that (1) for purposes of federal law, an individual's sex means the individual's biological sex at birth; and (2) distinctions between the sexes are justified in certain settings, laws, and policies.
